At that time, after the dragon kings made this vow,
they circumambulated the Buddha three times and bowed their heads in reverence.
They attained the Buddha's holy intent and each returned to their seats in order.
At that time, there was a dragon king named Boundless Adornment Ocean Cloud Majestic Virtue Wheel Canopy,
the lord of the trichiliocosm.
He attained irreversibility and abided by the power of his vows.
In order to make offerings, respect, pay homage to the TathÄgata, and listen to and accept the true Dharma,
he came to this JambudvÄ«pa.

placed his right knee on the ground,
joined his palms towards the Buddha,
and said to the Buddha, World-Honored One, I now wish to ask a few questions.
May the TathÄgata, the One of Perfect Supreme Knowledge, please grant permission.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to Boundless Adornment Ocean Cloud,
The Dragon Kingå¨å¾·è¼ªè“‹ said:
Great Dragon King, if you have any doubts, you may ask as you please.
I will explain and expound for you, causing your mind to rejoice.
Having said this, the Dragon King ç„¡é‚ŠèŠåš´æµ·é›²å¨å¾·è¼ªè“‹ then addressed the Buddha, saying:
Yes, World-Honored One, how can it cause the Dragon Kings to eliminate all suffering and experience peace and happiness?
Having experienced peace and happiness, it will also cause timely sweet rain to fall on this JambudvÄ«pa.
It will cause all trees, forests, medicinal herbs, and seedlings to grow with flavor and sap.
It will cause all the people of JambudvÄ«pa to experience happiness.
At that time, the World-Honored One, having heard these words,
immediately told the great dragon king ç„¡é‚ŠèŠåš´æµ·é›²å¨å¾·è¼ªè“‹:
Excellent, excellent! You now benefit those sentient beings,
and are able to ask the TathÄgata about such matters.
Great Dragon King, listen well, listen thoroughly, and listen single-mindedly.
You should pay attention as I explain it for you.
Dragon King, if you accomplish one Dharma, it will enable all dragons to eliminate all suffering and be endowed with peace and joy.
What is that one Dharma? It is called practicing loving-kindness.
Great Dragon King, if there are any heavenly beings or humans who practice great loving-kindness,
fire cannot burn them, swords cannot harm them,
water cannot drown them, and poison cannot affect them.
Internal and external enemies cannot encroach upon them.
They sleep peacefully and wake up peacefully.
They protect their bodies with their own blessings.
They attain majestic virtue through great blessings and are not oppressed by others.
Their appearance is upright and they are loved and respected by the masses in the realms of humans and gods.
Wherever they go, they are unobstructed.
All suffering is eliminated and their minds are filled with joy and all kinds of happiness.
By the power of great loving-kindness, after their lives end, they are reborn in the Brahma world.
Great Dragon King, if there are any heavenly beings or humans
who cultivate the practice of great loving-kindness and attain these benefits and blessings, then, Dragon King,
With loving physical actions, loving verbal actions, and loving mental actions, one should practice.
Furthermore, Dragon King.
There is a dhÄraá¹‡Ä« called Bestowing Peace and Bliss to All Sentient Beings.
You dragons should always read, recite, remember, and uphold it.
It can eliminate all the suffering and distress of the dragons and bring them peace and bliss.
After those dragons have attained bliss,
they will be able to timely and properly rain sweet rain upon JambudvÄ«pa.
Causing all trees, forests, medicinal herbs, and seedlings to grow.
At that time, the dragon king again addressed the Buddha, saying:
